1370: Lubertus moved to Cromme straet.D.10 after marriage.
Got married to Ermegardis at age 21 in 1370.
Had a son with Ermegardis, Lutbrandus, at age 21.
1372: Had a son with Ermegardis, Tiuri, at age 23.
1373: Had a daughter with Ermegardis, Badeloghen, at age 24.
1375: Had a daughter with Ermegardis, Aleydis, at age 26.
1380: Had a son with Ermegardis, Elberino, at age 31.
1382: Had a son with Ermegardis, Moys, at age 33.
1384: Lost son Lutbrandus when Lutbrandus was 15 years old.
1385: Lost his wife Ermegardis while she was giving birth to Beatrice in 1385.
1389: Lost son Tiuri when Tiuri was 18 years old.
1393: Lost daughter Aleydis when Aleydis was 19 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
